body_html:
Fix has been pushed; takes a few days to reach github. When you call
tf.scan/tf.map_fn, pass the argument infer_shape=False and things should
work. Added your use case as a unit test.

On Mon, Aug 1, 2016 at 3:23 PM, barimohsin notifications@github.com wrote:

@ebrevdo https://github.com/ebrevdo this is a showstopper for me as
well.. dealing with same issue as mentioned by @thomasquintana
https://github.com/thomasquintana.. will appreciate if someone from
google tensorflow team take a look at it soon.

—

body_text:

tf.scan/tf.map_fn, pass the argument infer_shape=False and things should
work.  Added your use case as a unit test.

Fix has been pushed; takes a few days to reach github.  When you call
tf.scan/tf.map_fn, pass the argument infer_shape=False and things should
work.  Added your use case as a unit test.
